links.title: Tesla Model X - Falcon Wing Door Safety Feature Secretly Removed! Part 1 of 2
links.description: Found out today that Tesla decided to take out a vital safety feature of their falcon wing doors. The same sensors (inductive) thats been a part of all the phantom obstacle detection issues. Instead of fixing the issue, they decided to remove the sensors from their firmware.

links.title: Tesla envy grips Germany's giants
links.description: FRANKFURT -- The gleaming white Porsche with menacing black trim took less than 8 minutes to complete the Nurburgring's demanding Nordschleife circuit. The result was respectable but not spectacular for a 600-hp beast that sprints from 0 to 62 mph in a little more than 3 seconds.
